name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a proficient Rust Developer with over 8 years of experience, I bring extensive expertise in software development with a strong emphasis on **Rust**, **Golang**, and **TypeScript**. My background includes building back-end systems and composable services, leveraging modern frameworks and strategies to deliver high-performance solutions. I am adept at implementing effective authentication and authorization mechanisms, ensuring robust identity and access management protocols.
I possess a solid foundation in modern development practices, including code review processes and collaborative work environments. My strong adaptability and curiosity drive continuous learning, enhancing my ability to mentor junior developers and foster a culture of growth within teams. My project experience spans various sectors, underlining my commitment to delivering secure and compliant applications while cultivating innovative solutions that meet complex business needs.
